function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular sanitation of self-checkout counters, contactless payment options, and installation of protective barriers","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict social distancing protocols, including spacing out workstations, staggering breaks, and limiting the number of workers in confined spaces.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Work-from-home","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consider the potential interaction effects between covariates and green features in the models to disentangle direct and indirect effects.","category":"Rethinking the design of future studies, demographically representative samples, data collection, interpretation of findings, and translating findings into recommendations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote the use of available tools and languages for ontology development, provide training and resources","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement purchase limits, increase replenishment efforts, and educate consumers on responsible buying","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement sanitation infrastructure and promote proper sanitation practices to eliminate open defecation","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of market conditions, application","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of data privacy regulations, access control measures, and ethical guidelines for the use of
